channel.title: Blog on Marc Tudurí
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Marc Tudurí

item.title: New site with Hugo
item.description: Hi, My old site was a little bit abandoned and hard to update so I decided to renew it. For this time, I decided to use a static site generator so I gave a chance to Hugo. I never tried before but I discovered that it has its own themes site which is awesome as saves you a lot of customization time. By the way, if you wonder what template I’m using is the Cocoa enhanced theme.
